COMMON.POPUP_BLOCK_MESSAGE:
Popup blocked.
Please check your browser settings.
COMMON.MAX_SEARCH_PERIOD: Search duration may not be greater than !{0}days.

MAIN.VISIBILITY_HIDDEN:
The page has been deactivated.
You may want to refresh to back on it.

INSPECTOR.APPLICATION_INSPECTOR_USAGE_GUIDE_MESSAG:
[TEXT]:{value=Application Inspector is not enabled.
To enable Application Inspector, please refer to}|[LINK]:{href=https://github.com/naver/pinpoint/blob/master/doc/application-inspector.md\target=blank\style=color:#428bca\linkText=this link}

APPLICAITION_NAME_ISSUE.ISSUE_MESSAGE: The agent is currently registered under !{1} due to the following:
ISSUE_CAUSES: 1. The agent has moved from !{0} to !{1}
2. A different agent with the same agent id has been registered to !{1}
ISSUE_SOLUTIONS: For case 1, you should delete the mapping between !{0} and !{1}.
For case 2, the agent id of the duplicate agent must change.

INSPECTOR.CHART_INTERACTION_GUIDE_MESSAGE: * You can zoom in on the chart by dragging the mouse.

TRANSACTION_LIST.TRANSACTION_RETRIEVE_ERROR:
Transaction information is missing
Will go to Main

AGENT_MANAGEMENT.PASSWORD_GUIDE: Enter password if you have set one.

AGENT_STATISTIC.ZOOM_GUIDE: You can zoom in/out the chart through the mouse.
AGENT_STATISTIC.LOAD_GUIDE: It takes a long time to load the agent's statistical data.

GENERAL.DESC: * User configuration is stored in browser cache. Server-side storage will be supported in a future release.

INSPECTOR_MANAGER.EMPTY: Select charts to display on screen.

INSTALLATION.DESC: * You can check if Application Name and Agent ID are duplicated.
INSTALLATION.LENGTH_GUIDE: You can enter up to !{0} characters.

USER_GROUP.VALIDATION: You can enter only numbers, alphabets, and '-', '_' characters.(4~30)

PINPOINT_USER.USER_ID_VALIDATION: You can enter only numbers, alphabets lowercase, and '-' ,'_' characters.(4~24)
PINPOINT_USER.NAME_VALIDATION: You can enter only numbers, alphabets, Hangeul, and '-', '_', '.' characters.(1~30)
PINPOINT_USER.DEPARTMENT_VALIDATION: You can enter only numbers, alphabets, Hangeul, and '-', '_', '.' characters.(3~40)

EXPERIMENTAL.DESC: * You may try the experimental features.

WEBHOOK.ALIAS: If empty, it is set to the entered Url.

SUPPORT.INSTALL_GUIDE: Please install one of the following browsers and try again.

NAVBAR.TITLE: Application List
NAVBAR.DESC: Shows the list of applications with Pinpoint installed.

ITEMS.NAME: Icon
ITEMS.DESC: Type of the Application

ITEMS.NAME: Text
ITEMS.DESC: Name of the Application. The value of -Dpinpoint.applicationName in Pinpoint agent configuration.

ITEMS.NAME: Inbound
ITEMS.DESC: Number of depth to render for requests coming into the selected node.

ITEMS.NAME: Outbound
ITEMS.DESC: Number of depth to render for requests going out from the selected node

NAVBAR.TITLE: Period Selector
NAVBAR.DESC: Selects the time range for search data.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-clock\style=font-size:17px}
ITEMS.DESC:
Query for data traced during the most recent selected time-period.
Auto-refresh is supported for 5m, 10m, 3h time-period.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-calendar-alt\style=font-size:17px}
ITEMS.DESC: Query for traced data between two selected times with the maximum of 48 hours.

ITEMS.NAME: Bidirectional
ITEMS.DESC:
Renders inbound/outbound nodes for each and every node (within limit) even if they are not directly related to the selected node.
Note that checking this option may lead to overly complex server maps.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px}|[TEXT]:{value=X-Axis}
ITEMS.DESC: Response Time

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px}|[TEXT]:{value=Y-Axis}
ITEMS.DESC: Transaction Count

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#34b994}|[TEXT]:{value=1s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (less than 1 second)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#51afdf}|[TEXT]:{value=3s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (1 ~ 3 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#ffba00}|[TEXT]:{value=5s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (3 ~ 5 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#e67f22}|[TEXT]:{value=Slow}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (greater than 5 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#e95459}|[TEXT]:{value=Error}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Failed transactions regardless of response time

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px}|[TEXT]:{value=X-Axis}
ITEMS.DESC: Response Time

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px}|[TEXT]:{value=Y-Axis}
ITEMS.DESC: Transaction Count

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#34b994}|[TEXT]:{value=1s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (less than 1 second)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#51afdf}|[TEXT]:{value=3s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (1 ~ 3 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#ffba00}|[TEXT]:{value=5s}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (3 ~ 5 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#e67f22}|[TEXT]:{value=Slow}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Successful transactions (greater than 5 seconds)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;margin-right:8px;color:#e95459}|[TEXT]:{value=Error}
ITEMS.DESC: No. of Failed transactions regardless of response time

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Clicking on a legend item shows/hides all transactions within the selected group.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Dragging on the chart zooms in to the dragged area.

SERVER_MAP.TITLE: Server Map
SERVER_MAP.DESC: Displays a topological view of the distributed server map.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Each node is a logical unit of application.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: The integer value inside of the node represents the number of server instances assigned to that application. (Not shown when there is only one such instance.)

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: An alarm icon will be displayed inside of the node if an error/exception is detected in one of the server instances.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: When the node is selected, the transaction information flowing into the application is displayed on the right side of the screen.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Each arrow represents a transaction flow.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: The number shows the transaction count. Displayed in red for error counts that exceeds the threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: When the arrow is selected, the transaction information that passes through the selected section is displayed on the right side of the screen.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Right-clicking on an arrow displays the context menu for filtering.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: The Filter in the Context menu shows only the transactions that pass through the selected section.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Filter wizard allows you to configure more detailed filters.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: [TEXT]:{value=When the filter is applied,}|[ICON]:{className=fa-filter\style=font-size:15px}|[TEXT]:{value=icon will be displayed on the arrow.}

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Right-clicking on any blank area displays a server map configuration menu.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Merge: Groups all mergeable nodes and displays it as a single node.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Refresh: Initialize the viewport and the zoom level of the server map.

REAL_TIME.TITLE: Active Request
REAL_TIME.DESC: Shows the active request count of each agent in realtime.

ITEMS.NAME: UNSUPPORTED VERSION
ITEMS.DESC: Agent version too old. (Please upgrade the agent to 1.5.0+)

ITEMS.NAME: CLUSTER OPTION NOTSET
ITEMS.DESC: Option disabled by agent. (Please set profiler.pinpoint.activethread to true in profiler.config)

ITEMS.NAME: TIMEOUT
ITEMS.DESC: Agent connection timed out receiving active request count. Please contact the administrator if problem persists.

ITEMS.NAME: NOT FOUND
ITEMS.DESC: Agent not found. (If you get this message while the agent is running, please set profiler.tcpdatasender.command.accept.enable to true in profiler.config)

ITEMS.NAME: CLUSTER CHANNEL CLOSED
ITEMS.DESC: Agent session expired.

ITEMS.NAME: PINPOINT INTERNAL ERROR
ITEMS.DESC: Pinpoint internal error. Please contact the administrator.

ITEMS.NAME: No Active Thread
ITEMS.DESC: The agent has no requests that are currently active.

ITEMS.NAME: No Response
ITEMS.DESC: No response from Pinpoint Web. Please contact the administrator.

ITEMS.NAME: Gap
ITEMS.DESC: Elapsed time between the start of the previous method and the entry of this method

ITEMS.NAME: Exec
ITEMS.DESC: Duration of the method call from entry to exit

ITEMS.NAME: Exec(%)
ITEMS.DESC: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;color:#5bc0de;margin-right:4px}|[TEXT]:{value=The execution time of the method call as a percentage of the total execution time of the transaction}
[ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:11px;color:#4343C8;margin-right:4px}|[TEXT]:{value= A percentage of the self execution time}

ITEMS.NAME: Self
ITEMS.DESC: Duration of the method call from entry to exit, excluding time consumed in nested methods call

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:15px;color:#2EB089}
ITEMS.DESC: Successful Transaction

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-circle\style=font-size:15px;color:#E64A4F}
ITEMS.DESC: Failed Transaction

ITEMS.NAME: X-Axis
ITEMS.DESC: Transaction Timestamp

ITEMS.NAME: Y-Axis
ITEMS.DESC: Response Time

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-plus\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Drag on the scatter chart to show detailed information on selected transactions.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-cog\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Set the min/max value of the Y-axis (Response Time).

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-download\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Download the chart as an image file.

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-expand-arrows-alt\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Open the chart in a new window.

AGENT_LIST.TITLE: Agent List
AGENT_LIST.DESC: List of agents registered under the current Application Name

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-tasks\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Hostname of the agent's machine

ITEMS.NAME: [IMAGE]:{name=icon-down}
ITEMS.DESC: Agent was shutdown at the time of query

ITEMS.NAME: [IMAGE]:{name=icon-disconnect}
ITEMS.DESC: Agent was disconnected at the time of query

ITEMS.NAME: [IMAGE]:{name=icon-error}
ITEMS.DESC: Agent status was unknown at the time of query

ITEMS.NAME: [ICON]:{className=fa-info-circle\style=font-size:15px}
ITEMS.DESC: Agent running at the time of query has no sign.

HEAP.TITLE: Heap
HEAP.DESC: JVM's heap information and major garbage collection time required

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Maximum heap size

ITEMS.NAME: Used
ITEMS.DESC: Heap size currently in use

ITEMS.NAME: Major GC
ITEMS.DESC: Time required for major garbage collection (number of Major GCs in parenthesis if it occurred more than once)

NON_HEAP.TITLE: Non-Heap
NON_HEAP.DESC: JVM's non-heap information and major garbage collection time required

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Maximum non-heap size

ITEMS.NAME: Used
ITEMS.DESC: Non-heap size currently in use

ITEMS.NAME: Major
ITEMS.DESC: Time required for major garbage collection (number of Major GCs in parenthesis if it occurred more than once)

CPU_USAGE.TITLE: Cpu Usage
CPU_USAGE.DESC: JVM/System's CPU Usage - For multi-core CPUs, displays the average CPU usage of all the cores.

ITEMS.NAME: Java 1.6
ITEMS.DESC: Only JVM's CPU usage is collected.

ITEMS.NAME: Java 1.7+
ITEMS.DESC: Both JVM's and system's CPU usage are collected.

TPS.TITLE: Transactions Per Second
TPS.DESC: Transactions received by the server per second

ITEMS.NAME: Sampled Continuation (S.C)
ITEMS.DESC: Profiled transactions that started from another agent

ITEMS.NAME: Sampled New (S.N)
ITEMS.DESC: Profiled transactions that started from the selected agent

ITEMS.NAME: Unsampled Continuation (U.C)
ITEMS.DESC: Unprofiled transactions that started from another agent

ITEMS.NAME: Unsampled New (U.N)
ITEMS.DESC: Unprofiled transactions that started from the selected agent

ITEMS.NAME: Skipped New (S.S.N)
ITEMS.DESC: Unprofiled transactions that started from the selected agent because of processing limit

ITEMS.NAME: Skipped Continuation (S.S.C)
ITEMS.DESC: Unprofiled transactions that started from another agent because of processing limit

ITEMS.NAME: Total
ITEMS.DESC: All transactions

ACTIVE_REQUEST.TITLE: Active Request
ACTIVE_REQUEST.DESC: Snapshots of the agent's active request status, categorized by how long they have been active for serving a request.

ITEMS.NAME: Fast (1s)
ITEMS.DESC: Number of requests that have been active for less than or equal to 1s

ITEMS.NAME: Normal (3s)
ITEMS.DESC: Number of requests that have been active for less than or equal to 3s but longer than 1s

ITEMS.NAME: Slow (5s)
ITEMS.DESC: Number of requests that have been active for less than or equal to 5s but longer than 3s

ITEMS.NAME: Very Slow (slow)
ITEMS.DESC: Number of requests that have been active for longer than 5s

RESPONSE_TIME.TITLE: Response Time
RESPONSE_TIME.DESC: Shows the status of agent's response time.

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average Response Time (unit : milliseconds)

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Maximum Response Time (unit : milliseconds)

DATA_SOURCE.TITLE: Data Source
DATA_SOURCE.DESC: Shows the status of agent's data source.

ITEMS.NAME: Active Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average number of active connections

ITEMS.NAME: Active Max
ITEMS.DESC: Maximum number of active connections

ITEMS.NAME: Total Max
ITEMS.DESC: The maximum number of connections that can be allocated at the same time

ITEMS.NAME: Type
ITEMS.DESC: Type of DB Connection Pool

OPEN_FILE_DESCRIPTOR.TITLE: File Descriptor
OPEN_FILE_DESCRIPTOR.DESC: Shows the status of agent's file descriptors.

ITEMS.NAME: Open File Descriptor
ITEMS.DESC: Number of open file descriptor currently used

DIRECT_BUFFER_COUNT.TITLE: Direct Buffer
DIRECT_BUFFER_COUNT.DESC: Shows the status of agent's direct buffer.

ITEMS.NAME: Direct Buffer Count
ITEMS.DESC: Number of direct buffer

DIRECT_BUFFER_MEMORY.TITLE: Direct Buffer Memory
DIRECT_BUFFER_MEMORY.DESC: Shows the status of agent's used direct buffer memory.

ITEMS.NAME: Direct Buffer Memory Used
ITEMS.DESC: Currently used direct buffer memory

MAPPED_BUFFER_COUNT.TITLE: Mapped Buffer
MAPPED_BUFFER_COUNT.DESC: Shows the status of agent's Mapped buffer.

ITEMS.NAME: Mapped Buffer Count
ITEMS.DESC: Number of Mapped buffer

MAPPED_BUFFER_MEMORY.TITLE: Mapped Buffer Memory
MAPPED_BUFFER_MEMORY.DESC: Shows the status of agent's used Mapped buffer memory.

ITEMS.NAME: Mapped Buffer Memory Used
ITEMS.DESC: Currently used Mapped buffer memory

TOTAL_THREAD.TITLE: Total Thread
TOTAL_THREAD.DESC: Shows the agent's total thread count

ITEMS.NAME: Total Thread Count
ITEMS.DESC: Number of total thread

LOADED_CLASS_COUNT.TITLE: Loaded Class Count
LOADED_CLASS_COUNT.DESC: Shows the agent's loaded class count

ITEMS.NAME: Loaded Class Count
ITEMS.DESC: Number of loaded class

UNLOADED_CLASS_COUNT.TITLE: Unloaded Class Count
UNLOADED_CLASS_COUNT.DESC: Shows the agent's unloaded class count

ITEMS.NAME: Unloaded Class Count
ITEMS.DESC: Number of unloaded class

HEAP.TITLE: Heap
HEAP.DESC: Heap size used by the agent JVMs

ITEMS.NAME: Min
ITEMS.DESC: Smallest Heap size used by an agent JVM

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average Heap size used by the agent JVMs

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Largest Heap size used by an agent JVM

JVM_CPU_USAGE.TITLE: JVM CPU Usage

SYSTEM_CPU_USAGE.TITLE: System CPU Usage

ITEMS.NAME: Min

ITEMS.NAME: Avg

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Largest system CPU usage of agents

TPS.TITLE: Transactions Per Second
TPS.DESC: Number of transactions received by the agents per second

ITEMS.DESC: Lowest TPS of the agents

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average TPS of the agents

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average memory used by direct buffer

MAPPED_BUFFER_COUNT.DESC: Number of Mapped Buffer used by agents

ITEMS.DESC: Min number of Mapped Buffer

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average number of Mapped Buffer

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Max number of Mapped Buffer

MAPPED_BUFFER_MEMORY.TITLE: Mapped Buffer Memory
MAPPED_BUFFER_MEMORY.DESC: Number of Mapped Buffer Memory used by agents

ITEMS.NAME: Min
ITEMS.DESC: Min memory used by mapped buffer

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average memory used by mapped buffer

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Max memory used by mapped buffer

TOTAL_THREAD.TITLE: Total Thread
TOTAL_THREAD.DESC: Number of total thread used by each agent

ITEMS.NAME: Min
ITEMS.DESC: Minimum of total thread count by each agent

ITEMS.NAME: Avg

LOADED_CLASS_COUNT.TITLE: Loaded Class Count
LOADED_CLASS_COUNT.DESC: Number of loaded class by each agent

ITEMS.DESC: Minimum of loaded class count by each agent

ITEMS.NAME: Avg

UNLOADED_CLASS_COUNT.DESC: Number of unloaded class by each agent

ITEMS.NAME: Avg
ITEMS.DESC: Average of unloaded class count by each agent

ITEMS.NAME: Max
ITEMS.DESC: Maximum of unloaded class count by each agent

ALARM.TITLE: Types of Alarm Rule
ALARM.DESC: The following types of alarm rules are supported by Pinpoint.

ITEMS.NAME: SLOW COUNT
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of slow requests sent to the application exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: SLOW RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the percentage(%) of slow requests sent to the application exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: ERROR COUNT
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of failed requests sent to the application exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: ERROR RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the percentage(%) of failed requests sent to the application exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: TOTAL COUNT
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of all requests sent to the application exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: SLOW COUNT TO CALLEE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of slow requests sent by the application exceeds the configured threshold. You must specify the domain or the address(ip, port) in the 'Notes' field: ex) www.naver.com, 127.0.0.1:8080

ITEMS.NAME: SLOW RATE TO CALLEE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the percentage(%) of slow requests sent by the application exceeds the configured threshold. You must specify the domain or the address(ip, port) in the 'Notes' field: ex) www.naver.com, 127.0.0.1:8080

ITEMS.NAME: ERROR COUNT TO CALLEE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of failed requests sent by the application exceeds the configured threshold. You must specify the domain or the address(ip, port) in the 'Notes' field: ex) www.naver.com, 127.0.0.1:8080

ITEMS.NAME: ERROR RATE TO CALLEE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the percentage(%) of failed requests sent by the application exceeds the configured threshold. You must specify the domain or the address(ip, port) in the 'Notes' field: ex) www.naver.com, 127.0.0.1:8080

ITEMS.NAME: TOTAL COUNT TO CALLEE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the number of all requests sent by the application exceeds the configured threshold. You must specify the domain or the address(ip, port) in the 'Notes' field: ex) www.naver.com, 127.0.0.1:8080

ITEMS.NAME: HEAP USAGE RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the application's heap usage(%) exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: JVM CPU USAGE RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the application's CPU usage(%) exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: SYSTEM CPU USAGE RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Sends an alarm when the application's CPU usage(%) exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: DATASOURCE CONNECTION USAGE RATE
ITEMS.DESC: Triggered when the application's DataSource connection usage(%) exceeds the configured threshold.

ITEMS.NAME: DEADLOCK OCCURRENCE
ITEMS.DESC: Sends an alarm when deadlock condition is detected in application.

ITEMS.NAME: FILE DESCRIPTOR COUNT
ITEMS.DESC: Sends an alarm when the number of open file descriptors exceeds the configured threshold.
